Portfolio holdings of Daniel Loeb - Third Point. Daniel Loeb - Third Point stock picks:. Stock Holdings page.
Daniel Loeb - Third Point i
Investment Approach

Third Point LLC is an SEC-registered investment adviser based in New York City. The firm was founded in 1995 by Daniel S. Loeb, who serves as CEO and oversees all investment activity. Daniel Loeb has more than 27 years of experience in the financial markets, with particular emphasis on special situation equities, distressed debt and risk arbitrage.

Third Point employs an event-driven, value-oriented investment style. The Firm seeks to identify situations where we anticipate a catalyst will unlock value.

We focus on delivering exceptional risk adjusted returns with limited market exposure.
